website_summaries.verdict: The GE G100 promises to deliver a wealth of features for a modest price, but its image quality is poor, and its performance is frustrating.
cons: Severe rolling shutter effect in video

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Takes really clear pictures, even when zoomed way in. The only gripe I have, is why is it so hard to find a battery for this camera.. on eBay, the only place to get it is from Hong kongand it says to make sure it matches the model number, which the picture did not, so I'm not ordering from them... I did find a place that sells one that's a little stronger than the original, but they have no charger for it. I will be looking for a charger on another site. My other camera I had no problem getting an extra battery plus a charger in one place. Other wise I would give it five stars.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures for awhile
customer_reviews.text: The camera took great pictures for awhile. Then after a few weeks the on/off button quit working and stayed stuck inside the the box of the camera. I sent it back for a refund and still have not gotten a refund even though it has been weeks. I wish it would have continued to work for it was a good little camera while it worked. If they would fix that problem with the on/off switch the camera would be fine.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald J. Lipchik

customer_reviews.title: Good price poor camera.
customer_reviews.text: They arrived on time, a graduation gift for my daughter. The big disappointment was the battery didn't hold the charge more than 10-15 minutes. It was too late to returnd them so I went to a camera store and purchased a betters for it. It costed almost as much as I paid for the camera. Hoping that the defective battery was the problem.
customer_reviews.author: Obie B. Nevels

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera. I bought it for an international trip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera. I bought it for an international trip, and it worked wonderfully. It takes good, clear photos and video, doesn't weigh too much, and even with the strap, it's not cumbersome or in the way. The only downside is it doesn't get great battery life, and it would be nice to see a version that takes a standard AA or AAA battery, but it wasn't enough to detract from the camera's overall use.
customer_reviews.author: Crow

customer_reviews.title: Best as an inexpensive HD Camera.
customer_reviews.text: The sensor is mediocre for taking pictures, but I think this is better served as a cheap HD 1080p video camera. Best for performance or "stiller" recording. Keep in mind, it records at 30fps. It stops at 29 minutes of recording, there is no way around this, whatsoever. (I've asked GE, it's a EU trade policy thing for most cameras)
customer_reviews.author: J. Madison

customer_reviews.title: Am pleased with this camera
customer_reviews.text: Am pleased with this camera. The only complaint is that during filming it makes a grinding noise while it is constantly focusing. But that may just be a fluke thing. Overall am happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera
customer_reviews.text: For the money this is a great little camera. The only thing I was not aware of is it does not take batteries, you have to charge it. So would have rather had batteries because if out some where with no where to charge and it goes dead, no good. Other wise it works great and was very happy with the service from this seller. It arrived early.
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Martiniano

customer_reviews.title: This camera is amazing. The picture is great
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to create a small commercial for our small business. Wanted something in 1080p. WOW! This camera is amazing. The picture is great. We had external mics on but the built in mic is amazing too.
customer_reviews.author: WF

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice camera with a nice zoom , that's what I was looking for. Compact and the pictures are nice...I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: ladycat1691

customer_reviews.title: GE is an awesome company 2
customer_reviews.text: 1. GE is an awesome company 2. Camara with Great Specs for Excelent Price
customer_reviews.author: Denis Roberto Salazar

customer_reviews.title: Beware
customer_reviews.text: I order 2. Its a good thing as only one works.
customer_reviews.author: rdpronchuk

customer_reviews.title: Nice camera
customer_reviews.text: Nice camera for the price. Takes good pictures and videos, a reasonable 720p. Use a trypod for the zoom. Good entry level camera.
customer_reviews.author: sargd

customer_reviews.title: The best Compact Point and Shoot I have owned
customer_reviews.text: The best Compact Point and Shoot I have owned. The zoom is remarkable. Total of 90x. Clear and so easy to use. It is now my camera of choice.
customer_reviews.author: The Crew Dawg

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: the item received as shown with the same details also with great quality too. i am suggesting this camera for the others as it contains great functional quality for different photos.
customer_reviews.author: Aimen Elmeshri

customer_reviews.title: It didn't work
customer_reviews.text: Dead on arrive. When I put battery inside, camera turn on and that was all. Camera can't turn off or on. Lens remained open (and extended). I'm very dissapointed. .
customer_reviews.author: Marco Casanova

customer_reviews.title: but so far we like the camera itself
customer_reviews.text: The camera was missing a cord that I expected to come with it. I had purchased the camera elsewhere originally (but it was a display model and had issues), and that one had had a cord with it to connect to the computer. We are still working on figuring out all of the features, but so far we like the camera itself.
customer_reviews.author: Becky A. Acla

customer_reviews.title: broke in 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: The lens stuck in the extended out position 2 weeks after I bought it , while I was on vacation at Disney World. My I Phone had sharper pictures.
customer_reviews.author: Mary S.

customer_reviews.title: The battery life on this camera is very poor. It holds no pictures so you definitely need ...
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on this camera is very poor. It holds no pictures so you definitely need a disk in order to use the camera. I did not have it for a week before it malfunctioned. The lens camera came out when I powered it up, now it will not go back in. In process of returning it, will see how that goes.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L.

customer_reviews.title: Full HD digital camera
customer_reviews.text: This camera has more settings than an amateur will ever need. Great camera, easy to use. I would recommend it to anyone for casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

product_meta.title: General Imaging Full-HD Digital Camera with 14.4MP, CMOS, 15X Optical Zoom, 28mm Wide Angle Lens, 3-Inch LCD and HDMI (Red) G100-RD
product_meta.description:
GE G100 Power Pro Series Bridge Digital Camera features advanced Aptina A-Pix CMOS pixel technology for high performance 14MP, high speed continuous shot, image blending, improved Full-HD 1080p video and low light 3200 ISO sensitivity. Additional highlights include 15X Optical Zoom, 3.0"LCD, 28mm Wide Angle Lens, HDMI Output, Optical Image Stabilization, Object Tracking, Shutter Priority mode, Program mode, Auto Scene, Face Beauty, Pan-capture Panorama, Smile & Blink Detection, Face Auto Exposure, Red-eye Removal, High Dynamic Range, and more. Powered by LI-ion Battery.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER



Improved HDR feature blends three different exposures to create one perfect image
Click here to learn more about the advanced ways your G100 will help you take better pictures Don't let life pass you by. Capture it all with the Power PRO Series G100 fueled by the newest CMOS technology. Check out powerful features like High-Speed Continuous Shooting, for the ability to shoot 10 frames per second in full resolution. And with a 28mm wide-angle lens and 15x long zoom you can get everyone in, plus get up close and personal.

Create your own highlight reel as every action scene becomes easy to capture in Full HD 1080p video
With multi-exposure, capture the action in six successive shots and combine them in a single photo. View larger FULL HD 1080P VIDEO AND HDMI OUTPUT
Create your own highlight reel as every action scene becomes easy to capture in Full HD 1080p video. Share your high resolution videos instantly with ultra-convenient HDMI connectivity.

THE CMOS ADVANTAGE
When image is everything, CMOS technology delivers. With features like High-Speed Continuous Shooting, Full 1080p HD and improved High Dynamic Range+ (HDR+), you'll never miss an action shot again.

HIGH DYNAMIC RANGE
HDR+ (High Dynamic Range+) Photos unite. Now you never have to lose the beauty of low-light images. An improved HDR feature blends three different exposures, combining the most detailed portions of each to create one perfect image.

MULTI-EXPOSURE
With the ability to blend multiple images, you can finally see the whole picture. The Multi-Exposure feature captures the action in six successive shots then combines them into in a single photo. Just one button and you're on your way.

OPTICAL IMAGE STABILIZATION
The optical image stabilization automatically adjusts for unintentional camera movements, giving you crisp, clear pictures every time.

PANCAPTURE
With most cameras, "panoramic" means standing way back from your subject while it cuts off the top and bottom of the photo. With the Pancapture feature, a true single panoramic picture requires only one press of the shutter button and you panning the camera across the shot. The G100 automatically takes the remaining 2 shots, then seamlessly stitches them together.

AUTO SCENE
Close ups? Low lighting? With Auto Scene Detection, the camera surveys the lighting and environment and automatically sets the exposure for the sharpest, most vibrant pictures possible. You get to concentrate on capturing the moment while the camera does the heavy lifting.

OBJECT TRACKING
Moving targets are no problem with this cool feature. The GE High Speed Object Tracking Mode lets you target, track, and automatically focus on your subject. For action shots, there's no better way to go.

WHAT'S IN THE BOX?
GE G100 Camera, rechargeable Lithium-ion battery, AC adapter, USB cable, neck strap, CD-ROM, manual, quick start guide, feature guide, warranty card.

High Speed Tracking Mode lets you target, track, and automatically focus on your subject TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS
 * Active Image Sensor Pixels: 14.4 Megapixels
 * Image Sensor: 15.1 Megapixels [1/2.3" (Aptina A-Pix CMOS pixel technology)]
 * Lens Optical Zoom: 15x
 * Focal Length: 5.0 mm (Wide) - 75 mm (Tele)
 * 35mm Film Equivalent: 28 mm (Wide) - 420 mm (Tele)
 * F Number: f/3.9 (Wide) - f/5.6 (Tele)
 * Lens Construction: 11 elements in 8 groups
 * Shooting Modes: Auto P, S, Manual, Face Beautifier, Scene [ASCN, Portrait, Sport, Landscape, Children, Indoor, Leaf, Branch, Text, Party, ID, Fisheye, Panning Shot, Photo Frame, Sketch, Snow, Sunset, Fireworks, Glass, Museum, Night Landscape, Night Portrait, Multi-Exposure, Pet (cat), Pet (dog)], Panorama and Movie
 * Focusing Range: Normal: (Wide) 23.6" ~8/60 cm ~8, (Tele) 59.0" ~8/150 cm ~8; Macro: (Wide) 1.9" ~8/5.0 cm ~8
 * Still Image: 14MP: 4320x3240, (3:2) 12MP: 4320x2880, (16:9) 10MP: 4320x2432, 8MP: 3264x2448, 5MP: 2592x1944, 3MP: 2048x1536, 2MP 1920x1080, 0.3MP: 640x480
 * Video Resolution: 1080p 30, 720p 60, 720p 30, VGA, QVGA
 * Movie Format: MOV (H.264), Audio: ACC (Stereo)
 * Image Format: Exif 2.2 (JPEG)
 * View Angle: 0 ~ 360 degrees
 * LCD Display: 3.0 inch (230,400 Pixels) TFT-LCD
 * ISO Sensitivity: Auto, ISO 100/200/400/800/1600/3200
 * Dimensions: 4.2" x 2.7" x 1.3" (107.2 mm x 68.2 mm x 32.5 mm)
feature_bullets: High speed shooting that captures every exciting detail with 10 frames per second and in full resolution
Captures all of your videos in full high-definition 1080p resolution
Target, track and automatically focus on a moving object with our high speed object tracking mode
Automatically enhances a subject's face by softening unnatural skintones and brightening and opening the eyes
Automatically adjusts for unintentional camera movements, giving you clear, crisp pictures every time

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.4 out of 5 stars28 ratings3.4 out of 5 stars
